```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(fs)
library(lubridate)
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
```

## Réimportation des données

```{r}
 data <-  read.csv(file = "data/raw/athlete_events.csv")
```

```{r}
skim(data)
```

## Données extrêmes

```{r}

p1 <- ggplot(data,
       aes(Age))

p1 + geom_histogram(color = "black",
                    fill = "#facade",
                    binwidth = 1)

data %>% filter(Age > 78) %>% 
    select(Name, Sex,Team, Games, Sport, Age)


```

## Age vs Sex

```{r}

p2 <- ggplot(data,
             aes(Sex, Age))+
    geom_boxplot()

p2
```

## Évolution du ratio Homme / Femme

```{r}
evolution <- data %>% 
    group_by(Year, Sex) %>% 
    summarise(n = n()) %>% 
    mutate(ratio = n / sum(n) * 100) %>% 
    ungroup()
```

```{r}
evolution_f <- evolution %>% filter(Sex == "F")
evolution_h <- evolution %>% filter(Sex == "M")

ggplot(evolution,
       aes(Year, ratio, color = Sex))+
    geom_line()+
    geom_point()

ggplot(evolution_f,
       aes(Year, ratio))+
    geom_line()+
    geom_point()

ggplot(evolution_h,
       aes(Year, ratio))+
    geom_line()+
    geom_point()
```
